com.github.battleship

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.battleship.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that controls the whole game of Battleship Has both the player and AI and uses their methods to preform the most basic of game logic
    Author:
    kbagal

      • playRound

        public com.github.battleship.Location playRound(com.github.battleship.Location ath)
        Method to play one round of the game and check if the game has ended or not
        Parameters:
        ath - (attempt to hit) location to try to fire to by player
        Returns:
        Location where AI is going to hit for use in frontend

      • playerHit

        public boolean playerHit(com.github.battleship.Location loc)
        Method to return a boolean for whether a player has gotten hit if it gets shot at a certain location To be used in the frontend of the code, not used for game logic
        Parameters:
        loc - location to test if player gets hit
        Returns:
        boolean whether player gets hit at that location or not

      • endGame

        public com.github.battleship.Location endGame()
        Game ending method Returns a different set of locations depending on who won
        Returns:
        Location (-1, 1) if Player win, (1, -1) if AI win

        Returns:
        myPlayer the game's player
